cast.overview: World famous movie star Olivia faces a PR disaster when a paparazzi snaps a photo of her with her married lover, Vincent. The hard-working valet Antonio accidentally appears in the same photo and is enlisted to pose as Olivia’s new boyfriend as a cover-up. This ruse with Olivia thrusts Antonio into the spotlight and unexpected chaos.
cast.title: The Valet

details.biography: Armando Hernández was born as Armando Hernández Villegas. He is an actor, known for Fast Food Nation (2006), De la calle (2001) and Sangre de mi sangre (2007).
details.name: Armando Hernández
